title: Did Keno Reeves say: "The way to heaven is not through your yard '?
subtitle: The viral quote has been on the Internet for years, but only recently the name of the Hollywood Star was attached to it.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Kanu Reeves once said, "I don't care how much you don't love me. The last time I checked, it wasn't the way to heaven through your courtyard."
